verses.verse: The <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> and his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

Therefore shall they <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto them.

And <S%H2088>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H4941>due<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> them that <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7716>sheep;<s%> and they shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H2220>shoulder,<s%> and the two <S%H3895>cheeks,<s%> and the <S%H6896>maw.<s%>

The <S%H7225>firstfruit<s%> also of thy <S%H1715>corn,<s%> of thy <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of thine <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1488>fleece<s%> of thy <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> shalt thou <S%H5414>give<s%> him.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> him out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1931>him<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H259><s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H185>desire<s%> of his <S%H5315>mind<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%>

Then he shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> do, which <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
They shall have like <S%H2506>portions<s%> <S%H2506><s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> that which cometh of the <S%H4480>sale<s%> <S%H4465><s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> his <S%H1>patrimony.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> among you any one that maketh his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> or that <S%H7080>useth<s%> <S%H7081>divination,<s%> or an observer of <S%H6049>times,<s%> or an <S%H5172>enchanter,<s%> or a <S%H3784>witch,<s%>
Or a <S%H2266>charmer,<s%> <S%H2267><s%> or a <S%H7592>consulter<s%> with familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> or a <S%H3049>wizard,<s%> or a <S%H1875>necromancer.<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H428>things<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H1558>because<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> doth drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3423>possess,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> observers of <S%H6049>times,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7080>diviners:<s%> but as for <S%H859>thee,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>suffered<s%> thee <S%H3651>so<s%> to do.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> unto thee a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee, of thy <S%H4480>brethren,<s%> <S%H251><s%> like unto <S%H3644>me;<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him ye shall <S%H8085>hearken;<s%>

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H7592>desiredst<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let me <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> let me <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> that I <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, They have <S%H3190>well<s%> spoken that <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

I will raise them <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> their <S%H251>brethren,<s%> like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> and will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I shall <S%H6680>command<s%> him.

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1875>require<s%> it <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him.

But <S%H389><s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H2102>presume<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak,<s%> or <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> even <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> shall we <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

When <S%H834><s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> if the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>follow<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> come to <S%H935>pass,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> but the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it <S%H2087>presumptuously:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> him.
